dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COLIN emerges onto the street... Closes the door behind him... We move in on his brave/sad face as he gazes up at the old, bluey, London sky, and says to Liz's spirit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Humbled. Accepting.       Very quiet) Be lucky, Liz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly he begins to walk the wet street... Away from us.. Towards his new life...
